Technology.q: You enjoy solving logical problems and puzzles.
You like building things on a computer or mobile device.
You are fascinated by how websites and apps work.
You enjoy learning new programming languages or tools.
You like working with data and finding patterns.
You are comfortable spending long hours in front of a computer.
You are interested in artificial intelligence and machine learning.
You like working in teams on technical projects.
You are curious about cybersecurity and protecting digital systems.

Healthcare.q: You like caring for people and helping them feel better.
You are comfortable in clinical environments like hospitals.
You have a strong stomach and can handle medical procedures.
You enjoy learning about human anatomy and physiology.
You can work well under pressure and in emergency situations.
You have excellent communication skills for patient interaction.
You are interested in medical research and new treatments.
You can work long shifts and irregular hours.
You have attention to detail for accurate medical records.
You want to make a difference in people's lives through healthcare.

Business.q: You enjoy analyzing markets and business trends.
You like presenting ideas and leading discussions.
You are good at networking and building relationships.
You enjoy working with numbers and financial data.
You like coming up with creative solutions to business problems.
You are comfortable with sales and customer service.
You enjoy managing projects and coordinating teams.
You are interested in entrepreneurship and starting your own business.
You like working in fast-paced, competitive environments.
You enjoy learning about different industries and business models.

Arts.q: You enjoy expressing yourself through creative mediums.
You have a strong appreciation for visual aesthetics and design.
You like working with your hands to create things.
You enjoy storytelling and communicating through art.
You are interested in cultural and historical contexts of art.
You like experimenting with different materials and techniques.
You enjoy collaborating with other creative professionals.
You are comfortable with criticism and feedback on your work.
You like working on projects that have emotional impact.
You are interested in using technology to enhance artistic expression.

Engineering.q: You enjoy solving complex technical problems.
You like designing and building physical systems or structures.
You are good at mathematics and physics.
You enjoy working with tools and machinery.
You like learning about how things work mechanically.
You are interested in sustainable and environmentally friendly solutions.
You enjoy working on large-scale projects with teams.
You like using computer-aided design (CAD) software.
You are interested in innovation and developing new technologies.
You enjoy seeing your designs come to life in the real world.
